text: This is my work and my glory—to bring to pass the immortality and eternal life of man.
The Lord called his people Zion
column6: because they were of one heart and one mind.

text: The Lord promised Abraham that his seed would bear this ministry and Priesthood unto all nations.
As spirits we were organized before the world was.
God created man in his own image.
A man shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one.
How then can I do this great wickedness
column6: and sin against God?

text: The Ten Commandments
Choose you this day whom ye will serve.
Who shall stand in his holy place? He that hath clean hands
column6: and a pure heart.

text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart and he shall direct thy paths.
Though your sins be as scarlet
column6: they shall be as white as snow.

text: Woe unto them that call evil good
column6: and good evil.

text: The restoration of the gospel is a marvellous work and a wonder.
Surely Jesus Christ hath borne our griefs
column6: and carried our sorrows.

text: The blessings of a proper fast
Turn away from doing thy pleasure on my holy day; and call the sabbath a delight.
Before I formed thee in the belly I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.
The prophet is a watchman unto the house of Israel.
The Bible and the Book of Mormon shall become one in thine hand.
God shall set up a kingdom
column6: which shall never be destroyed.

text: The Lord God revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.
The blessings of paying tithing
Elijah shall turn the heart of the children to their fathers.
Let your light so shine before men.
Come unto me
column6: all ye that labour and are heavy laden
column7: and I will give you rest.

text: Jesus said
column6: I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom.

text: Thou shalt love the Lord thy God. Thou shalt love thy neighbour.
For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour
column6: which is Christ the Lord.

text: Jesus Christ commanded
column6: partake of the sacrament in remembrance of me.

text: For a spirit hath not flesh and bones
column6: as ye see me have.

text: Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit
column6: he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

text: For God so loved the world
column6: that he gave his only begotten Son.

text: If any man will do his will
column6: he shall know of the doctrine.

text: And this is life eternal
column6: that they might know thee the only true God

text: Your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost.
Neither is the man without the woman
column6: neither the woman without the man

text: As in Adam all die
column6: even so in Christ shall all be made alive.

text: In the Resurrection
column6: there are three degrees of glory.

text: In the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ.
The Church is built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets
column6: Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone.

text: The day of Christ shall not come
column6: except there come a falling away first.

text: The holy scriptures are able to make thee wise unto salvation.
Heavenly Father is the Father of spirits.
If any of you lack wisdom
column6: let him ask of God.

text: Faith
column6: if it hath not works

text: The gospel was preached also to them that are dead.
And the dead were judged according to their works.
I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded.
Adam fell that men might be; and men are
column6: that they might have joy.

text: They are free to choose liberty and eternal life or captivity and death.
All are alike unto God.
God will give unto the children of men line upon line
column6: precept upon precept.

text: Feast upon the words of Christ; for behold
column6: the words of Christ will tell you all things what ye should do.

text: Ye must pray always.
When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
Those that keep the commandments of God are blessed in all things.
Put off the natural man and become a saint through the atonement of Christ the Lord.
Believe in God; believe that he has all wisdom.
Be baptized in the name of the Lord
column6: as a witness that ye have entered into a covenant with him.

text: And he shall go forth
column6: suffering pains and afflictions and temptations of every kind.

text: There must be an atonement made
column6: an infinite and eternal sacrifice.

text: Go no more after the lusts of your eyes.
Wickedness never was happiness.
It is upon the rock of our Redeemer that ye must build your foundation.
I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.
Be perfect even as I
column6: or your Father who is in heaven is perfect.

text: Come unto me and be baptized that ye may be sanctified by the reception of the Holy Ghost.
Ye receive no witness until after the trial of your faith.
If men come unto me then will I make weak things become strong unto them.
Charity is the pure love of Christ.
Ask with a sincere heart
column6: with real intent
column7: having faith in Christ and by the power of the Holy Ghost ye may know the truth of all things.

text: Joseph Smith saw two Personages
column6: whose brightness and glory defy all description.

text: The only true and living church.
Whether by mine own voice or by the voice of my servants
column6: it is the same.

text: Look unto me in every thought; doubt not
column6: fear not.

text: I will tell you in your mind and in your heart
column6: by the Holy Ghost.

text: The Aaronic Priesthood holds the keys of the ministering of angels
column6: and of the gospel of repentance

text: The worth of souls is great in the sight of God.
How great will be your joy if you should bring many souls unto me!
I
column6: Jesus Christ
column7: have suffered these things for all.

text: The prophet's word ye shall receive
column6: as if from mine own mouth.

text: I will reveal myself from heaven with power and great glory and dwell in righteousness with men on earth a thousand years.
Marriage is ordained of God.
He who has repented of his sins
column6: the same is forgiven.

text: Of you it is required to forgive all men.
By Jesus Christ the worlds are and were created.
I
column6: the Lord
column7: am bound when ye do what I say.

text: In the ordinances thereof
column6: the power of godliness is manifest.

text: Seek learning
column6: even by study and also by faith.

text: The blessings of the Word of Wisdom.
The Melchizedek Priesthood has power and authority to administer in spiritual things.
The rights of the priesthood cannot be controlled nor handled only on the principles of righteousness.
The Father has a body of flesh and bones; the Son also; but the Holy Ghost is a personage of Spirit.
The new and everlasting covenant of marriage.
Joseph Smith brought forth the Book of Mormon
column6: which he translated by the gift and power of God.
